item.description:
That's right, we need 4  Volunteers to Volunteer at the Volunteer Party.

Here are the following tasks for the volunteers:

1 volunteer to greet the guests at the entrance.

3 volunteers at the welcome table to sell T-shirts, give name tags and ask guests to fill feedback forms.

We don't expect you to be there the whole time, you can switch with other volunteers, you have volunteers every where in the party.

I promise you will get an extra cup cake at the party baked by Chinh.

Note: Please don't double RSVP if you already signed up for the party, change the status accordingly.

Thank you

Phani

P.S. Many Boston Volunteers are friending our friend, the popular Paulette.

Who is Paulette: http://www.facebook.com/paulette.revere.7
item.how_to_find_us: We have the whole 2nd floor of Jose McIntyre's to ourselves. Look for us at the top of the stairs.

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Volunteer at the Boston Volunteers Party
